entry.content: Image: FromSoftware/Bandai Namco FromSoftware‚Äôs DLC looks to make an already great game even better My first steps into Elden Ring‚Äôs new Shadow of the Erdtree expansion feel like coming home again. After traveling there, by touching a withered arm, I step out into a grassy plain, and see a crumbling giant tree in the distance. The land is pocked with intangible gravestones and spirit-world versions of enemies I‚Äôve faced before: dogs and wandering nobles. But it isn‚Äôt long until I face somethin...
